userStories.title: Create src/verification/verifier.ts with runVerifier function that spawns verifier agent to check if phase goal was achieved
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Function exports runVerifier(opts: VerifyOptions), loads project.json, finds phase, spawns agent with verifier prompt, parses VERIFICATION signal with status (passed/gaps_found/human_needed) and score, returns verification result
